entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Prince George
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:34 PM PST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince George Airport 02:52 AM PST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -0.7°C
Pressure: 101.5 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -2.0°C
Wind: S 17 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 5:14 PM PST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow or rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Wind becoming south 30 km/h in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. Forecast issued 5:14 PM PST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 70%
